topic_note: Olympiad / Number Theory / When is n^n a perfect square?
stem: For how many positive integers n between 1 and {limit} inclusive is n^n a perfect square?

topic_note: Olympiad / Number Theory / HCF and LCM relation
stem: The LCM of two positive integers is {lcm} and their HCF is {hcf}. If one of the numbers is {a}, what is the other number?

topic_note: Olympiad / Number Theory / (d-1)^n + (d+1)^n modulo d^2
stem: Let a_n = ({base}-1)^n + ({base}+1)^n. Find a_{exp} modulo {mod}.
answer: {(powMod(base - 1, exp, mod) + powMod(base + 1, exp, mod)) % mod}

topic_note: Olympiad / Number Theory / Reverse base conversion
stem: The number {value} in base 10 is written as '{digits}' in base b (where each digit is less than b). Find b.

topic_note: Olympiad / Number Theory / Sum of divisors function
stem: Find the sum of all positive divisors of {n}.

topic_note: Olympiad / Algebra / Positive solutions to linear Diophantine equations
stem: How many ordered pairs of positive integers (x, y) satisfy {a}x + {b}y = {target}?

topic_note: Olympiad / Algebra / Tangent recurrence (AIME 2001)
stem: The sequence is defined by x_0 = {num}/{den} and x_{n+1} = ({den}x_n + {num}) / ({den} - {num}x_n). Find x_{term}.

topic_note: Olympiad / Algebra / Homogeneous functional equation
stem: A function satisfies f({k}x) = {k}f(x) for all x > 0 and f(x) = 1 - |x-2| for 1 <= x <= 3. Find f({target}).

topic_note: Olympiad / Algebra / Quadratic with two prime roots
stem: The roots of x^2 - {sum}x + k = 0 are both prime numbers. Find the value of k.

topic_note: Olympiad / Algebra / Functional equation with f(1/x)
stem: f(x) + {c}f(1/x) = {d}x for all x != 0. Find f({val}).

topic_note: Olympiad / Algebra / Telescoping partial fractions
Olympiad / Algebra / Polynomial remainder theorem
stem: When P(x) is divided by (x - {a}) the remainder is {ra}, and by (x - {b}) the remainder is {rb}. When divided by (x - {a})(x - {b}) the remainder is cx + d. Find c + d.

topic_note: Olympiad / Geometry / Shortest path on a cube
stem: An ant moves along the surface of a cube with side length {s} from one vertex to the opposite vertex. What is the shortest possible distance?

topic_note: Olympiad / Geometry / Inradius of primitive Pythagorean triples
stem: A right triangle has legs {a} and {b} and hypotenuse {c}. Find the radius of its inscribed circle.

topic_note: Olympiad / Geometry / Shoelace area
stem: Find the area of the triangle with vertices ({x1},{y1}), ({x2},{y2}), ({x3},{y3}).

topic_note: Olympiad / Probability / Random walk on a triangle
stem: A bug starts at a vertex of a triangle and at each step moves to one of the two adjacent vertices with equal probability. After {steps} moves, what is the probability it is back at the start?

topic_note: Olympiad / Probability / Linearity of expectation
stem: A committee of {size} people is chosen at random from {men} men and {women} women. What is the expected number of women on the committee?

topic_note: Olympiad / Combinatorics / No fixed points
stem: In how many ways can {n} distinct letters be placed into {n} envelopes so that no letter goes into its correct envelope?

topic_note: Olympiad / Combinatorics / Non-negative integer solutions
stem: Find the number of non-negative integer solutions to x_1 + x_2 + ... + x_{k} = {n}.

topic_note: Olympiad / Combinatorics / Pigeonhole principle
stem: What is the smallest number of integers that must be chosen from 1..{m} to guarantee that at least two sum to {m}+1?

topic_note: Year 9-10 / Competition / Vector displacement
stem: A spider crawls {a} units east, then {b} units north, then {c} units west, then {d} units south. How many units is it from the starting point?

topic_note: Year 9-10 / Competition / Least common multiple
stem: What is the smallest positive integer divisible by all integers from 1 to {n}?

topic_note: Year 9-10 / Competition / Counting squares in a grid
stem: In an {n}x{n} grid of small squares, how many {k}x{k} squares are there?

topic_note: Year 9-10 / Competition / Units digit of large powers
stem: What is the units digit of {base}^{exp}?

topic_note: Year 9-10 / Competition / Sum of first n odd numbers
stem: What is the sum of the first {n} odd positive integers?

topic_note: Year 9-10 / Competition / Permutations with order restriction
stem: How many ways are there to arrange the letters of the word {word} such that {let1} appears before {let2} in the arrangement?

topic_note: Year 9-10 / Competition / Counting primes
stem: How many prime numbers are there less than {n}?

topic_note: Year 9-10 / Competition / Resultant displacement
stem: A frog jumps {a} m up, {b} m north, {c} m east, then {a} m down. What is the straight-line distance from start to finish?
